transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, ek baat bataiye mere me inquiry kyu nahi aa raha inquiry kyu nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Inquiry nahi aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ji. A sir abhi to mai sir aaj chutti pe hu. Kal sir mai office pahuchunga aapko kal dekh ke bata du to.
Customer: Sir to koi aur ko line pe karwaiye na sir. Mai samajh raha hu chutti pe lekin mere ko problem to solution chahiye na.
Executive: Aap mere ko na WhatsApp pe apne company ka mere ko naam bhej do ek baar.
Customer: Sir aapke paas to detail aa gaya hoga mera. Mera call to direct company me laga hai.
Executive: Actually kya hota hai ki PNS number aata hai sir. Aapka sir jo number hai na wo nahi aaya mere paas.
Customer: Chal rahi hai.
Executive: Apne mere ko WhatsApp pe apni company ka naam likh ke bhej do. All in one solution.
Customer: All in one solution.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai dekh ke batata hu. Aapko WhatsApp kar dunga mai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving inquiries.

- Wants immediate solution, not delayed due to leave.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to send company name on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and WhatsApp the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, whatsapp, pns number, company name
